targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.query: SELECT "name", "title", "quality", "video_decision", "quality_profile", "platform", "product_version", "location" FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "session_key"
